Because these frequencies are based on a specific study, the fractions may be different if another group of patients are examined. Sometimes, no information on frequency is available. In these cases, the sign or symptom may be rare or common.",GARD,Dandy-Walker cyst with Renal-Hepatic-Pancreatic dysplasia
What is (are) Cor triatriatum ?,"Cor triatriatum is an extremely rare congenital (present at birth) heart defect
